Company Search.desc: Search over 70,000 symbols by symbol name or company name, including cryptocurrencies, forex, stocks, ETFs, and other financial instruments.

Stock List.desc: Retrieve a comprehensive list of over 80,000 traded and non-traded stock symbols.

Company Info.desc: Access detailed profiles of companies, including general information and key metrics.

Quote.desc: Obtain real-time stock quotes for a given symbol.

Financial Statements.desc: Retrieve annual and quarterly income statements for a specified company.

Statement Analysis.desc: Access a variety of financial ratios for a specified company.

Valuation.desc: Retrieve valuation metrics for a specified company.

Price Targets.desc: Get analyst price targets for a specified company.

Upgrades & Downgrades.desc: Access historical and real-time ratings of a company.

Earnings Transcripts.desc: Access earnings call transcripts for a specified company.

SEC Filings.desc: Retrieve SEC filings for a specified company.

Earnings.desc: A list of upcoming and past earnings announcements for publicly traded companies, including the date, estimated earnings per share (EPS), and actual EPS (if available).

Dividends.desc: Retrieve information on upcoming and past dividend events.

Splits.desc: Access information on upcoming and historical stock splits.

IPO Calendar.desc: Get details on upcoming and past initial public offerings (IPOs).

Mergers & Acquisitions.desc: Retrieve data on recent mergers and acquisitions.

Charts.desc: Obtain historical price charts for a specified company.

Technical Indicators.desc: Access various technical indicators for a specified company.

ETF Holdings.desc: The FMP ETF Holdings endpoint provides a list of all the institutional investors that own shares of an ETF. For example, an investor may want to know which ETF has the highest exposure to a particular industry or sector.

Mutual Funds.desc: The FMP Mutual Funds endpoint provides a list of all the mutual funds that are registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

ESG Search.desc: Find companies and funds that align with your ESG values with FMP's ESG Search tool. Search by ESG rating, performance, controversies, and business involvement screens.

Senate trading.desc: Track the trading activity of US Senators and identify potential conflicts of interest with the FMP Senate Trading endpoint.
